Scholarships And Awards

Chinese Government Award for Outstanding Self-financed Students Abroad

2022

Recipient of the Chinese Government Award for Outstanding Self-financed Students Abroad, recognizing academic excellence and achievements while studying overseas.

Fully Funded PhD Scholarship from European Research Commission

2020

Selected for a highly competitive fully funded 4-year PhD scholarship awarded by the European Research Commission, supporting advanced research at UCL.

National Scholarship for Chinese Postgraduate Studies

2019

Recipient of the National Scholarship for Chinese Postgraduate Students, reflecting exceptional academic performance and contributions.
